Text.Page: Hm. <PCNAME>, <PCNAME> ... no, nothing in my records. You don't appear to have an account with this bank.
There's no safer place for your spare gear than a bank vault.
You can leave it with usâ€”whatever it is.
You can go perform deeds of valor with a clear head, knowing we're taking care of your gear.

Communities take root because someone brave carves out a safe place for them. They grow because someone shrewd know when to buy and when to borrow. But they only mature when someone wise codifies the rules that let them all live together in peace.
